citation: Abadjieva A, Pauwels K, Hilven P, Crabeel M. A new yeast metabolon involving at least the two first enzymes of arginine biosynthesis: acetylglutamate synthase activity requires complex formation with acetylglutamate kinase. J Biol Chem. 2001 Nov 16;276(46):42869–80.
